summary: The Fairness for Servicemembers and their Families Act of 2025 mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to periodically review the maximum automatic coverage amounts for Servicemembers’ Group Life Insurance and Veterans’ Group Life Insurance. This review, conducted every five years, will compare the existing coverage to an amount adjusted for inflation based on the Consumer Price Index. The Secretary must then submit the review results to the House and Senate Veterans' Affairs Committees.
